integrates the entire DITA for Publishers plugins suite, enabling you to migrate content from Open Office XML documents to DITA:
Open an OOXML document in . The document is opened in the Archive Browser view;
From the Archive Browser, open document.xml;document.xml holds the content of the document.
Click Configure Transformation Scenario(s) on the toolbar and apply the DOCX DITA scenario. In case you encounter any issues with the transformation, click the link below for further details about the Word to DITA Transformation Framework.
